title: Deficient Number

explanation.approach: Sum proper divisors, check if < n.

title: Perfect Number

explanation.approach: Sum proper divisors, check if = n.

title: Amicable Numbers

explanation.approach: Sum of a's divisors = b AND vice versa.

title: Twin Primes
Co-Prime Numbers
Kaprekar Number
description: Parts of square sum to n.

explanation.approach: Split n^2, parts sum to n.

title: Tech Number
Strontio Number
Xylem Phloem

explanation.approach: Edge digits sum = middle digits sum.

title: Trimorphic Number
Peterson Number
Sunny Number
